name: Under World
description:
Game: Under World

You control a submarine in order to find the lost 
treasure on the seabed, Deviate the walls pass 
through the rescue points, and be happy!

Controls:

Use the mouse to aim the submarine, use the right click to make it go slow

Criteria:

Criterion Name Describe implementation

-Endless Runner

the submarine is always on the move.

-Happy

The gameplay will increase the more you play and 
become fun you see your performance improving.

-Hyperactive

Do not take your eyes off the screen, the game 
is always on the move, do not go the wrong way.

-Chiptune

The music and effects are in conjunction 
with 8 bits, an incredible work of Cesar Lima

Credits:

Code/gameplay & Art: Jefesson Nunes
SFX/Muisic: Cesar Lima
